sentences.sContent: However, there is also an eddy of cooler water (purple) circulating counterclockwise at the top of the Loop Current.
sentences.sContent_eng: However, there is also an eddy of cooler water (purple) circulating counterclockwise at the top of the Loop Current.
sentences.sCn: 不过，在洋流的顶端还出现一个逆时针方向旋转的水流（紫色部分），而且温度较低。
